alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Kearney; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Franklin, Webster, southern Adams and southeastern Kearney Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 514 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Heartwell to near Upland to 9 miles southeast of Hildreth. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Campbell and Holstein around 525 AM CDT. Bladen and Roseland around 530 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Riverton, Ayr, Inavale, Red Cloud, Blue Hill and Cowles. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
